author: IGN
description:
Get another look at gameplay and more from Holstin in this latest trailer for the upcoming psychological survival horror game from developer Sonka and publisher Team17. Holstin will be available on PC via Steam.

Holstin is set in an eerie, isolated 90’s Polish town consumed by an ominous presence. You’ve come looking for answers, but everyone seems possessed by something foul. Explore the festering town, interrogate locals and fight ungodly manifestations to get to the truth.
title: Holstin - Official Trailer

author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
Larian boss Swen Vincke confirmed some details about their upcoming game, Divinity. While the announcement trailer was decidedly not kid-friendly, the game's tone will be similar to Larian's hit RPG, Baldur's Gate 3, and it will be turn-based, too. Fans can also expect the game to hit early access, just like BG3. In other news, dataminers have unearthed about 30 more minutes of unused dialogue from Metroid Prime 4's NPCs. This basically confirms that the divisive NPCs were chattier than what's in the final game, but there's always a chance that DLC could unlock that content. And finally, Prime Video's Fallout Season 2 will be available a full day than originally announced. The first episode goes live tonight at 6pm Pacific.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Larian CEO Confirms Divinity Details, Will Be Similar to Baldur's Gate 3 - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description:
Pioner is available now in Steam Early Access. Watch the Pioner launch trailer for this post-apocalyptic MMO shooter game to see gameplay, terrifying enemies, and more.

Pioner takes players to a vast, atmospheric, post-apocalyptic island, where remnants of the Soviet era create an incredible alternate reality. The game emphasizes realism over traditional mechanics, offering an open world of over 50 km² filled with hidden dungeons, story quests, and faction missions that influence alliances and rewards. As a social-focused MMO, PIONER combines narrative-driven exploration with intense PvE and PvP gameplay where players shape the world through their actions.
title: Pioner - Official Early Access Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description: Check out the latest Final Fantasy 7 Remake Intergrade trailer for the RPG to see more of the story, combat, and the iconic Sephiroth. Final Fantasy 7 Remake Intergrade will be available on Nintendo Switch 2, Xbox Series X/S, and Xbox on PC as part of Xbox Play Anywhere on January 22, 2026. A free demo is out now, featuring the first chapter: the Mako Reactor 1 bombing mission. With the free demo, it is possible to carry over your save data to the main game. In addition, if save data has been created for the demo, the bonus items “Revival Earrings” and “Survival Set” can be claimed in the full game.
title: Final Fantasy 7 Remake Intergrade - Official One-Winged Angel Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Disclosure Day teaser trailer for this upcoming sci-fi film created and directed by Steven Spielberg. Disclosure Day stars Emily Blunt (Oppenheimer, A Quiet Place), Josh O’Connor (Challengers, The Crown), Colin Firth (The King’s Speech, Kingsman franchise), Eve Hewson (Bad Sisters, The Perfect Couple), and Colman Domingo (Sing Sing, Rustin). 

If you found out we weren’t alone, if someone showed you, proved it to you, would that frighten you? This summer, the truth belongs to seven billion people. We are coming close to … Disclosure Day. 

Based on a story by Spielberg, the screenplay is by David Koepp. Disclosure Day is produced by Kristie Macosko Krieger (The Fabelmans, West Side Story) and by Spielberg for Amblin Entertainment. The executive producers are Adam Somner and Chris Brigham. 

Disclosure Day opens in theaters June 12, 2026.
title: Disclosure Day - Official Teaser Trailer (2026) Emily Blunt, Josh O’Connor, Colin Firth

author: IGN
description:
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Splintered Fate is available now on Nintendo Switch 2. Watch the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Splintered Fate for the roguelike action game to see gameplay and more as you join the crime-fighting brothers through inter-dimensional portals to rescue their abducted master, Splinter.

#IGN #Gaming #Nintendo
title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Splintered Fate - Official Nintendo Switch 2 Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the trailer for Huxley: The Oracle, an upcoming graphic novel from Ben Mauro. Huxley: The Oracle is the first prequel in the Huxley saga. Huxley: The Oracle will first be available internationally in the UK on October 30, 2025, with a global release on December 2, 2025.

Set during the height of the Oracle Empire, Huxley: The Oracle follows Max as he starts his career as a Ronin soldier designed to maintain order on the desert planet Fury‑7. Max becomes involved in a plot that threatens to destroy the empire while the AI-controlled empire fights brutal wars to maintain its control. His search for hidden secrets in the desert leads him to a path that will transform his identity while determining the destiny of the galaxy.
title: Huxley: The Oracle - Official Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Rainbow Six Mobile will be launching worldwide on iOS and Android devices on February 23, 2026. Watch the Rainbow Six Mobile release date trailer for this upcoming free-to-play, tactical first-person shooter mobile game from the Rainbow Six franchise.

In Rainbow Six Mobile, players will face off in 5v5 Player-vs-Player (PvP) matches in the core game mode: Attack vs. Defense. Attackers will deploy observation drones to gain intel and strategically breach through destructible walls, floors and ceilings, while defenders will barricade entry points and use spy cameras or traps to secure their location.

#IGN #RainbowSixMobile #Shooter
title: Rainbow Six Mobile - Official Global Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description:
The Switch 2 launched in June, 2025, marking the beginning of a whole new console generation for Nintendo. The more powerful hybrid console has seen an extremely busy first six months, filled with excellent first-party games, surprising third-party ports, and highly anticipated indies. And even deep into its ninth year, the original Switch provided its players with plenty to do, too, with the long-overdue arrivals of Super Mario Galaxy 2 and Xenoblade Chronicles X, and a few cross-generation Nintendo games that made it to both Switches. 

Nintendo itself published a whopping 16 games in 2025 – spread across new Switch 1 and 2 games and enhanced Switch 2 editions of older games – and along with the higher volume of third-party support brought on by a new console, it’s a crowded field to choose the best of the best from this year. But ranking things is what we do at IGN, so here are the best Nintendo Switch games in 2025 we went bananas for.

#IGN #GameOfTheYear2025 #2025Gaming
title: The Best Nintendo Game of 2025

author: IGN
description:
Take a peek behind the curtain of Edgar Wright's "The Running Man" and get the lowdown on Glenn Powell's disguises! 

In a near-future society, The Running Man is the top-rated show on television—a deadly competition where contestants, known as Runners, must survive 30 days while being hunted by professional assassins, with every move broadcast to a bloodthirsty public and each day bringing a greater cash reward. Desperate to save his sick daughter, working-class Ben Richards (Glen Powell) is convinced by the show’s charming but ruthless producer, Dan Killian (Josh Brolin), to enter the game as a last resort. But Ben’s defiance, instincts, and grit turn him into an unexpected fan favorite—and a threat to the entire system. As ratings skyrocket, so does the danger, and Ben must outwit not just the Hunters, but a nation addicted to watching him fall.

The Running Man is now available to buy or rent on the Apple TV app: https://apple.co/TheRunningMan

#IGN #TheRunningMan #AppleTV
title: The Running Man - Official "Disguises" Featurette (2026) Glen Powell, Josh Brolin, Colman Domingo

author: IGN
description:
The weapons are characters all on their own in High on Life 2, the upcoming first-person shooter comedy sequel from Squanch Games. Say hi to the latest one to be revealed: the Flint Turtle, a flamethrowing reptile who can be wielded or thrown in order to singe your enemies. 

High on Life 2 will be released on February 13, 2026 for PC, PS5, and Xbox Series X|S – including launching on day one into Xbox Game Pass.

#IGN #Gaming
title: High on Life 2 Weapon Reveal: Meet the Flint Turtle – IGN First

author: IGN
description:
Jeff's Winter Splash Festival is coming back... with a twist! Watch the latest Marvel Rivals trailer for the superhero team-based PVP shooter game to see what to expect with Jeff's Winter Splash Festival event, featuring new color variants of Jeff's Cuddly Fuzzlefin costume. 

Jeff drifts into a magical snow globe and joins tiny Jeffs for the unforgettable Winter Splash Festival. During the event, jump into chaotic 4v4v4 battles on the new Jeffland map. Jeff's Winter Splash Festival will be available on December 18, 2025 at 1 AM PT.

#IGN #MarvelRivals #WinterSplash
title: Marvel Rivals - Official New Game Mode: Jeff's Winter Splash Festival Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Get a peek at gameplay from Canyons in this latest teaser for the upcoming third-person action shooter game set in a procedurally generated world. Fight mysterious Awakened alone or in co-op for up to 4 players, command giant Crawlers, build your haven, and survive a brutal living world. The teaser also reveals that a 15-minute gameplay video will be available on IGN's YouTube channel tomorrow, December 17, 2025. 

Canyons will be available on PC.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Canyons - Official Gameplay Teaser Trailer

author: IGN
description:

#IGN #TalesOfSeries #RPG

author: IGN
description:
Get a peek at gameplay from Vampire Crawlers: The Turbo Wildcard from Vampire Survivors in this latest trailer for the upcoming action strategy deckbuilder game with roguelite elements. 

Vampire Crawlers: The Turbo Wildcard from Vampire Survivors will be available on Steam, Xbox Series X/S, PlayStation 5 (PS5), Nintendo Switch, and mobile in 2026.

#IGN #VampireCrawlers #Deckbuilder
title: Vampire Crawlers: The Turbo Wildcard from Vampire Survivors - Official Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Meet the new hero, Largo, in this latest Dota 2 trailer for the MOBA. Update 7.40 is available now, featuring reworked heroes, new neutral items, terrain changes, and more.

#IGN #DOTA2 #MOBA
title: Dota 2 - Official New Hero Largo and Gameplay Update 7.40 Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Bonecrown Set in this latest ARC Raiders trailer. The Bonecrown Set includes the Bonecrown outfit, the Reliquary backpack, the drum backpack attachment, the deer skull backpack charm, the braided bun hair style, the painted mask face style, and 2,400 Raider tokens. 

The Bonecrown Set for Arc Raiders is available in the in-game store.

#IGN #ArcRaiders #ExtractionShooter
title: ARC Raiders - Official The Bonecrown Set Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Get a detailed look at gameplay in this new overview trailer for Grime 2, the upcoming metroidvania in which players make use of tendrils made of hands to absorb foes and summon molds in their shape. Wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2529790/GRIME_II/

#IGN #Gaming
title: Grime 2: Official Gameplay Overview Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Rebekah Valentine talks with Miranda Sanchez about what she saw during a hands-off virtual demo of the upcoming Animal Crossing: New Horizons 3.0 Update and Nintendo Switch 2 Version. Miranda learned more about how amiibo work, designing hotel rooms, megaphone limitations, and more. The ACNH 3.0 Update and Switch 2 Version are both out on January 15, 2026.

#IGN #Gaming #Nintendo
title: New Details on Animal Crossing: New Horizons 3.0 and Switch 2 Version

author: IGN
description:
It's time to go back to Pandora! James Cameron's third chapter of the Avatar franchise, Fire and Ash, picks up right where The Way of Water left off, with both the Sullys struggling to find their place in the world and with James Cameron continuing to blow us away with big screen spectacle. IGN's Max Scoville reviews Fire and Ash, to find out how much "new" there is left in Pandora, how familiar Avatar seems in spite of a whole new tribe, and whether or not that actually matters, because man is this a big, fun movie.

#IGN #Movies
title: Avatar: Fire and Ash Review

author: IGN
description: Watch the Villainy launch trailer for this game of cooperation and betrayal. Gather your party of 4-10 players, but trust no one. Heroes and Villains plot against each other in quick, highly intense matches. Deception is your greatest weapon, and secrecy is the ultimate defense. Villainy is available now on Steam.
title: Villainy - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description: Join members of the development team at Bungie for a behind-the-scenes look at Marathon in this latest video for the upcoming PvPvE survival extraction FPS. In Marathon, players scavenge the lost colony of Tau Ceti IV as a bio-cybernetic Runner while surviving against hostile security forces, rival Runners, and inhospitable environments to seek their fortune. In the new video, the developers dive into updates and showcases the world, proximity chat, gameplay, increased visual fidelity, audio, music, zones (maps), loot and weapons, factions and contracts, updated UI, and much more. Marathon will be available in March 2026.
title: Marathon - Official 'Vision of Marathon' Overview
